release.desc: First beta release of the Xerces2 code. Besides numerous bug fixes, this release has changes and additions to XNI. The new XNI parser configuration framework has been added in this release.

update.note: Rewrote existing documentation, added XNI information, cleaned up stylesheets, and converted some docs to use custom DTDs.

fix.note: DTD method ordering problem for INCLUDE/IGNORE sections.

release.desc: Initial alpha release of Xerces2 code.
